item.title: Maximo Over Method Record
item.description: Recently, I statill develop in current project, I selved sevrial issue about override method. I plan to record them now. Purchase receives In purchase receives application, user can new, receive, return material. In bussiness, user can do these actions only on the purchase approve status is APPR, so if the status is not APPR, when user do that, throuth system notice user can’t do that. Firstly, the recievts line table binding a table class, and the receive, return action is in this method, now I can create a new class and override the two method.

item.title: Tmux
item.description: tmux is a terminal multiplexer, and it can improve your work efficiency. For me, it has less two usefully features in my common work. Firstly, I can use it work in multi process; Secondly, I can store my work directory, even if I exit the terminal, next time I can also restore the session by tmux a -t <session-name>. memory tips All the first, know the structure information of tmux.

item.title: Common Linux Command
item.description: Linux commands category by the first letter of command. A # 命令 alias [ei li e si] 别名 apropos [ai po pou] 恰当的 aspell 放弃 *awk [ao ke] 笨拙的 # 单词 aptitus [ai pu tei tui de] 才能[等同于apt] emerge [i mo jay] 浮现[等同于apt] pacman [pa ke man] 巴曼（越南）[等同于apt] yum [ya mu] 美味的、极好的[等同于apt] B # 命令 basename bash GUN Boume-Again SHell bc echo "obase=2;sqrt(1024)" | bc echo "scale=2;8/3" | bc bg ctrl+z to stop; from stop to start in bg; from stop to start to fg; builtin [bei ou tin] 内建用户 bzip2 # 单词 trip [si tui pu] 脱衣、除去 suffix [se fei ke si] 后缀 arbitrary [a bei te rei] 任意的 precision [pe sei shen] 精确 C cal display a calendar cat cfdisk partition table manipulator for linux chgrp change group ownership chmod change access permissions chown change file owner and group chroot run a command with a different root directory chkconfig system services(runlevel) cksum print CRC checksum and byte counts cmp compare two files comm compare two sorted files line by line command run a command - ignoring shell functions cron daemon to execute scheduled commands crontab shedule a command to run at a later time csplit split a file into context-determined pieces cut divide a file into several parts # 单词 concatenate [kao en, kai tei nei te] 连结 partition [pa tei xin] 划分 manipulator [me nei piu lei te] 操纵器 ownership [ou ne xi pu] 所有权 permission 允许，许可 divide [dei vai de] 分 D date dc desk calculator dd convert and copy a file, write disk headers, boot records declare declare variables and give them attributes df display free disk space diff difplay the differences between two files diff3 show differences among three files dig DNS lookup dir briefly list directory contents dircolors colour setup fo 'ls' dirname convert a full pathname to just a path dirs display list of remembered directories dmesg print kernel & driver messages du Estimate file space usage # 单词 briefly [bu rei fu li] 简单的，简短的 estimate [ai si tei mei te] 估计

item.title: Learn Crawlers Record
item.description: 示例，爬取京东手机价格信息 爬取京东手机价格信息 爬虫案例 取京东手机价格信息 SPU 与 SCU 的区别 SPU Strandard Product Unit 标准产品单位 SKU Stock Keeping Unit 库存量单位 报错记录 java.sql.SQLException: The server time zone value '���Ǳ�׼ʱ��' is unrecognized or represents more than one time zone. You must configure either the server or JDBC driver (via the 'serverTimezone' configuration property) to use a more specific time zone value if you want to utilize time zone support.

item.title: Git Learning
item.description: Learn from Git教程 把知识串联起来 Git 设计层面的理解 repository 中文为仓库，可以简单理解为一个目录，此目录下所有的文件都被git进行管理（包括每个文件的增删改，都会被git跟踪，以便随时查看与还原） Git 关键词分析 了解 Git 什么是Git，有什么特点 它是分布式版本控制系统，它由Linus两周写成 它为何而产生 集中式版本控制系统太慢 商业的BitKeeper不再为Linux社区提供免费使用权 集中式与分布式的区别 集中式的特点 版本库是集中放在中央服务器 必需联网才能工作（sszq: 这个特别感觉不是很明朗） 分布式的特别 分布式没有中央服务器，每个使用者的电脑都是一个版本库 不需要联网 安装与配置 Git # 对于旧一点的Linux版本，以 apt instll git-core 命令进行安装， # 原因是有个软件（GNU Interactive Tools）先于git出现，占用了此命名。 apt install git # 查看版本 git verison # 设置个人标识，目的：在分布式系统下要让别人知道你为何是你 # --global 参数目的：表示此机器上的所有Git repository都会使用此配置 # 当然也可以对某个仓库指定特定的用户名与邮箱 git config --global user.

item.title: Github Basic Command
item.description: creae a empty repository in github what you want to upload to github generate a public key in localhost for connection to github # defaut click three enter ssh-keygen -t -rsa -C "1004170070@qq.com" copy the file content named id_rsa.pub what crated by ssh-keygen command to github cat /mnt/c/User/Administrator/.ssh/id_rsa.pub verify the connectioin if is ok between localhost and github ssh -T git@github.com config you user info git config --global user.name "sszq" git config --global user.

item.title: About Reader
item.description: 关于读书 以我来说，读书无非三种可能： 获取知识 滋养品质 放纵强乐 书中自有颜如玉，放在哪种可能下都是没有问题的。 人总是习惯而又不察的沉湎于无尽空虚之中，在心性没有成熟之前，没有一套自己的思想价值观念。在物欲面前，个人的执守就是一委黄沙，经不起风吹雨打，终于支离散尽。 在没有思想支撑时，要时刻保持警醒，就相信一件事，那就是多做事。用无尽的事务来填充这不期而来的无尽空虚，以先入为主的姿态来迎拒这实力悬殊的空虚的侵袭。读书自来就是一件来化解这干戈的好作为，义理裹腹，盛名之下，不战而屈人之兵，是最好的生存形态了。 任何事，开始时，都是最难的，最让人焦灼，同时也是最提炼品质的，最让人铭于怀的。

item.title: Oracle Again
item.description: tablespace -- 创建表空间 create tablespace user1 datafile 'C:\app\oracle\oradata\maximo\user1_data.dbf' size 20M; -- 创建表空间，可扩展性 create tablespace user2 datafile 'C:\app\oracle\oradata\maximo\user2_data.dbf' size 100M autoextend on; -- 创建表空间，关闭自动扩展 create tablespace user22 datafile 'C:\app\oracle\oradata\maximo\user22_date.dbf' size 500M autoextend off; -- 指定数据文件的增长幅度 create tablespace user3 datafile 'C:\app\oracle\oradata\maximo\user3_data_dbf' size 20M autoextend on next 5M; -- 指定数据文件的最大容量 create tablespace user4 datafile 'C:\app\oracle\oradata\maximo\user4_data_dbf' size 20M autoextend on next 5M maxsize 500M; -- 指定数据文件的容量为不限制 create tablespace user42 datafile 'C:\app\oracle\oradata\maximo\user42_data_dbf' size 20M autoextend on next 5M maxsize unlimited; -- 为一个表空间创建多个数据文件 create tablespace multiple_data_file datafile 'C:\app\oracle\oradata\maximo\data_1.

item.title: Record Recent
item.description: 最近的氛围有点奇怪，被羲和厌恶，又会厌恶不为此被句所主导的人。 昨天发了工资，工作以来到手最多的一次，当然是加上工资条里少算的一部分。 每天工作之后精神与身体都会疲乏，工作多少却不相关拿多少酬劳。 在学习，为了跳槽，其实是为了羲和与我。人近而立，身不由己。 项目上的事还好吧，当下环境不允许你遇到大奸大恶，但总有些沙砾会磨在眼睛，好在人有情绪可以幽怨，还可排遣。 不是同路的人，接触久了，交往细节自会勾勒这真实面目，自私、轻视、尸位、排挤。是自己不争取，还是一直边缘人，难道是想得太多，更应该自己支配思想做些有用的功课。 当前工作的技术成分，八成是经验来担当。这些经验网上少见，不被外放。同一个团队，工作中也会对你是这样，是生于职场忧患么，只号令搬砖，不明细此劳力的来由，可见工具人才会让私心安乐。

item.title: Basic HTML Elements
item.description: The main purpose of this article is to make sure that all basic HTML Elements are decorated with CSS so as to not miss any possible elements when creating new themes for Hugo.

item.title: Creating a New Theme
item.description: Introduction This tutorial will show you how to create a simple theme in Hugo. I assume that you are familiar with HTML, the bash command line, and that you are comfortable using Markdown to format content. I’ll explain how Hugo uses templates and how you can organize your templates to create a theme. I won’t cover using CSS to style your theme. We’ll start with creating a new site with a very basic template.

item.title: About Hugo
item.description: Hugo is a static site engine written in Go. It makes use of a variety of open source projects including: Cobra Viper J Walter Weatherman Cast Learn more and contribute on GitHub. Setup Some fun facts about Hugo: Built in Go Loosely inspired by Jekyll Primarily developed by spf13 on the train while commuting to and from Manhattan. Coded in Vim using spf13-vim Have questions or suggestions?

item.title: (Hu)go Template Primer
item.description: Hugo uses the excellent Go html/template library for its template engine. It is an extremely lightweight engine that provides a very small amount of logic. In our experience that it is just the right amount of logic to be able to create a good static website. If you have used other template systems from different languages or frameworks you will find a lot of similarities in Go templates.

item.title: Getting Started with Hugo
item.description: Step 1. Install Hugo Go to Hugo releases and download the appropriate version for your OS and architecture. Save it somewhere specific as we will be using it in the next step. More complete instructions are available at Install Hugo Step 2. Build the Docs Hugo has its own example site which happens to also be the documentation site you are reading right now. Follow the following steps: Clone the Hugo repository Go into the repo Run hugo in server mode and build the docs Open your browser to http://localhost:1313 Corresponding pseudo commands:

item.title: Migrate to Hugo from Jekyll
item.description: Move static content to static Jekyll has a rule that any directory not starting with _ will be copied as-is to the _site output. Hugo keeps all static content under static. You should therefore move it all there. With Jekyll, something that looked like ▾ <root>/ ▾ images/ logo.png should become ▾ <root>/ ▾ static/ ▾ images/ logo.png Additionally, you’ll want any files that should reside at the root (such as CNAME) to be moved to static.
